attributes.action: GIVE WARNTONE A TEST LICENCE TO SAVE LIVES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am a serving firefighter in Buckinghamshire
motorist do not hear or see Emergency vehicles until the last seconds resulting in longer attendance times to incidents and more dangers to the public and the emergency workers.
When travelling in my car I received a traffic information signal from my local radio station which cut out my CD to warn me of a road problem, I thought this system could be used to help all emergency vehicles and cut response times, as well as warn road users we were there.
WARNTONE was invented.
 Ask yourself this "If you were trapped in a building or accident would you like the rescue services there in 10 minutes or 8” I rest my case.
As it stands the radio licence authority (RLA) and OFCOM\ say under current government laws this would be illegal and will not issue us with a test or manufacture licence.  I think to save life its worth changing the law.
Interest is high in the states  “WHY CAN WE NOT HAVE A TEMPORY TEST LIECENCE TO PROVE ONE WAY OR ANOTHER” OFCOM has said no on the grounds of people would not like there radio interrupted ,even if it would save lives PLEASE HELP ME TO REDUCE ATTENDANCE TIMES AND SAVES LIVE THEY MAY BE YOURS
